div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2339 Ullastret, 20 km. E of Gerona, 1964 Burial: c. 195 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 54 AR. Pot hoard from excavations Emporiae: 8 dr. 27 fr. (Pegasus type) 18 fr. (two dolphins type) 1 fr. (dolphin type) Disposition: Gerona Maluquer-Oliva, Pyrenae 1965, pp. 85-123, illus.
